detectors.description:
ERC20._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__102.sol#386) shadows:

ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__102.sol#573-587) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__102.sol#581-584)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__102.sol#585)

	- [_balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__102.sol#L581-L584)
	- [_balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__102.sol#L585)
